RE: [EQ_Necromancer] New Everquest Auction Web site
Spammed 4 of mine so far.
----- Original Message -----
From: Aaron DeLeskie
To: 'EQ_Necromancer@egroups.com'
Sent: Thursday, November 02, 2000 2:34 PM
Subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] New Everquest Auction Web site

Can someone please ban this email addy from posting to these boards? "craigba@..." this is the same troll who runs the $20 rip off everquest secrests site. He's spamming all of the eq boards. at least the 3 of them that I subscribe to....

-----Original Message-----
From: Rick [mailto:craigba@...]
Sent: Thursday, November 02, 2000 12:31 PM
To: EQ_Necromancer@egroups.com
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] New Everquest Auction Web site


There's a NEW Everquest Auction Web site..Also servers Ultima Online,

Please check it out when you get a chance
